attributes.action: Grant automatic asylum to the translaters that worked for the British in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Once again it is disgusting the lack of humanity the governments of this world show....Asylum should be given automatically for translaters that have worked for the British in Iraq. Their lifes and that of their family are at risk. At the moment the proccess is a complicated one and not one of the people, that risked their lifes, have been offered safety in Britain, but some translaters have been tortured and murdered for their service to the British army and the rest live in fear of their lives and that of their children.
To many people die for red tape and the procrastination.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
